title: The Intell On The Ground In Afghanistan Is Getting Worse (Ep 1590)
description:
I have a source on Afghanistan that tells me things are rapidly decaying on the ground. In this episode, I address the intell. I also discuss the mask “science” being challenged by liberal reporters. 

News Picks:


No accountability! There will be firings at the White House for the Afghanistan debacle?

An interesting take on vaccine mandates.

Even left wing media outlets are calling BS on kids in masks.


Fraud alert? Three hundred ballots discovered in a suspect’s vehicle in California.
